content: This plugin will no longer be available to {{productName}} users. Are you sure you want to continue?

comment.text: This translation key is used for a confirmation message that appears when deleting a plugin in an application, prompting users to confirm their action. The message includes placeholders for product name and title. It is displayed within a delete dialog modal.

usage.context:
onClose={onClose}
 displayType="modal"
 >
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("DeletePluginTitle")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 {t("DeletePluginDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 className="delete-button"
 key="DeletePortalBtn"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'مكون' (makoon) translates to 'component' or 'module', not 'plugin'. The correct translation for 'plugin' is 'إضافة' (idaaah).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لن يكون هذا الإضافة (idaaah) متاحًا لمستخدمي {{productName}} بعد الآن. هل أنت متأكد أنك تريد الاستمرار؟

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Haluako varmasti jatkaa?' is grammatically incorrect. The question marker 'ko' should follow the verb 'halu', not 'varmasti'.

The Armenian translation "Այս փլագինը այլևս հասանելի չի լինի {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերին: Վստա՞հ եք, որ ցանկանում եք շարունակել:" translates literally to 'This plugin will no longer be available to {{productName}} users. Are you sure you want to continue?'. While grammatically correct, it's a bit formal and could be improved for naturalness. A more conversational translation might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այս փլագինը այլևս չի կարող օգտագործվել {{productName}}-ի կողմից: Դուք համոզվա՞ծ եք, որ ուզում եք շարունակել:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '提供されません' (teikyou saremasen) while technically correct, can sound overly formal and abrupt for a user-facing message. A more conversational and user-friendly option would convey the message more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: このプラグインは{{productName}}ユーザーには利用できなくなります。このまま続けますか？

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the question mark at the end feels slightly stiff. Adding a more casual tone can improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: このプラグインは{{productName}}ユーザーには利用できなくなります。よろしいですか？

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '{{productName}} 사용자는 더 이상 이 플러그인을 사용할 수 없게 됩니다.' is a literal translation and lacks the warning/confirmation tone of the English 'This plugin will no longer be available to {{productName}} users. Are you sure you want to continue?'. It sounds more like a statement of fact than a prompt for confirmation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}} 사용자는 더 이상 이 플러그인을 사용할 수 없습니다. 정말 삭제하시겠습니까?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation lacks the question mark at the end of the sentence, typical for questions in Korean. This is especially important considering the prompt is designed to elicit a confirmation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a question mark at the end of the translated sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ປລັກອິນ' (plugin) is spelled correctly.
The word 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້' (users) is spelled correctly.
The word 'ຕ້ອງການ' (want) is spelled correctly.
The word 'ສືບຕໍ່' (continue) is spelled correctly.
The sentence structure is generally correct and understandable in Lao.

While technically correct, 'ສືບຕໍ່' (continue) might be better phrased as 'ດໍາເນີນການຕໍ່ໄປ' (proceed) or 'ກື່ງຕໍ່ໄປ' (go ahead) to sound more natural in this context. 'ສືບຕໍ່' can sometimes imply continuing an ongoing process, whereas here it's more about confirming a final action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປລັກອິນນີ້ຈະບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ກັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ {{productName}} ອີກຕໍ່ໄປ. ທ່ານແນ່ໃຈບໍ່ວ່າຕ້ອງການກື່ງຕໍ່ໄປ?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable '{{productName}}' is correctly placed and appears to be intended for dynamic insertion.
The word 'Dana' in 'Dana wtyczka' is not the correct translation for 'This plugin'. 'Dana' means 'Given' or 'Donated'. A more appropriate translation would be 'Ta wtyczka'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ta wtyczka nie będzie już dostępna dla użytkowników {{productName}}. Czy na pewno chcesz kontynuować?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Acest plugin nu va mai fi disponibil pentru utilizatorii spațiului {{productName}}' is slightly awkward. 'Spațiului' implies a 'space' or 'area', which isn't the intended meaning. It's referring to users of the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Acest plugin nu va mai fi disponibil pentru utilizatorii {{productName}}. Sigur doriți să continuați?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පේනුව' for 'plugin' is not the standard or most understandable term in Sinhala. 'ආප්පානය' (Appanaya) would be more common and easily understood. While 'පේනුව' isn't *wrong*, it's less natural.

The phrase 'ඔබට ඉදිරියට යාමට වුවමනා ද?' is a literal translation of 'Are you sure you want to continue?'. A more natural phrasing would be 'ඔබට මේ ක්‍රියාවලිය කරගෙන යාමට අවශ්‍යද?' or 'ඔබ මේවා ඉවත් කිරීමට කැමතියි?'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ඔබට ඉදිරියට යාමට වුවමනා ද?' with 'ඔබ මේවා ඉවත් කිරීමට කැමතියි?' or 'ඔබ මේ ක්‍රියාවලිය කරගෙන යාමට අවශ්‍යද?'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive suffix '-а' is appended to 'productName'. While grammatically correct, it's more common in Serbian to use a comma and a space when referencing a product or service.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Овај додатак више неће бити доступан корисницима {{productName}},. Да ли сте сигурни да желите да наставите?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive form '{{productName}}-a' is not the standard possessive form in Serbian. While technically understandable, it's less common and could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ovaj dodatak više neće biti dostupan korisnicima {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'no longer be available' is slightly stiff in Turkish. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu eklenti artık {{productName}} kullanıcıları için kullanılamayacak. Devam etmek istediğinize emin misiniz?
